org.apache.spark.ml.attribute

Class Attribute

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.ml.attribute.Attribute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryAttribute, NominalAttribute, NumericAttribute

    public abstract class Attribute
extends Object
implements scala.Serializable
    Abstract class for ML attributes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • toMetadata

        public abstract org.apache.spark.sql.types.Metadata toMetadata(boolean withType)
        Converts this attribute to Metadata.
        Parameters:
        withType - whether to include the type info

      • toMetadata

        public org.apache.spark.sql.types.Metadata toMetadata()
        Converts this attribute to Metadata. For numeric attributes, the type info is excluded to save space, because numeric type is the default attribute type. For nominal and binary attributes, the type info is included.

      • toStructField

        public org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructField toStructField(org.apache.spark.sql.types.Metadata existingMetadata)
        Converts to a StructField with some existing metadata.
        Parameters:
        existingMetadata - existing metadata to carry over
